summary: This mod add Alexandra - Mage and Warrior Companion
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w422/Den987/ScreenShot878.png[/IMG]
============
[color=red]DESCRIPTION[/color]
============
This mod add Alexandra - Combat Mage
She can conjure Flame Atronach and fight by Fire Magic
If you don\'t like magic give her 1H sword and she will fight well
Marryable , Essential , Fire Magic , Calculated
Age 20 , Even Toned , Race Imperial
[color=red]You can find her in Winterhold[/color]
I hope you like it

=============
[color=red]RECOMMENDED[/color]
=============
Better Female by Bella
CBBE

=============
[color=red]REQUIRED[/color]
=============
Apachii Sky Hair Female 1.0


=============
[color=red]INSTALLATION [/color]
=============
Setup all files to your data folder

=============
[color=red]UNINSTALLATION[/color]
=============
Delete bsa and esp files
_______________________

[color=red]CREDITS:[/color]
Apachii for Apachii Sky Hair used in this mod[/center]
author: Den987
